TheSimpletonMod:BorealisEvent.NAME: Borealis
DESCRIPTIONS: A vast #gghostly #gglow stretches across the night sky. You find yourself in absolute stillness. The silence is haunting. NL NL As you gaze upon the expanse of lights, you notice a low and pervasive #phumming. You suppose it's been there all along. NL NL You're suddenly feeling very afraid.

TheSimpletonMod:EarlyThawEvent.NAME: Early Thaw
DESCRIPTIONS: The last of the winter ice begins to melt. A tentative promise of new life emerges again.

TheSimpletonMod:EquipmentShedEvent.NAME: Derelict Shed
DESCRIPTIONS: You happen upon a disused shelter. NL NL A workbench covered in rusty tools stands in front. Sacks filled with rotted feed are strewn about. NL NL Not much appears to be of value, but you may be able to salvage some of the food. NL NL Or you could try to put some of the tools to use.

TheSimpletonMod:FirefliesEvent.NAME: Fireflies
DESCRIPTIONS: You step out into a clearing, where tiny #yglowing #ybeetles dance lazily in the summer air. You're filled with a pleasant contentment. NL NL You contemplate just sitting in the grass. Or you might try to catch a bug for yourself.

TheSimpletonMod:HeatWaveEvent.NAME: Heat Wave
DESCRIPTIONS: A relentless #rheat permeates the dungeon. Your limbs throb beneath your gear. You've lost the ability to sweat. NL NL You may not be able to endure this for much longer.

TheSimpletonMod:ReaptideEvent.NAME: Reaptide
DESCRIPTIONS: It's finally time for the #gharvest, and the earth has been good to you this season.  You'll eat well this year, though it always pays to plan for a long winter. NL NL Some insist on making offerings to the ancestors—rather than risking a poor harvest next year.

TheSimpletonMod:SnowedInEvent.NAME: Snowed In
DESCRIPTIONS: With a howl, the wind brings another blast of #bsnow. It's been like this for weeks now. NL NL It's no longer safe to travel. In fact, it's probably best if you just stayed inside. NL NL You've got enough food stored to last until the full moon, maybe longer. It should be enough—if you don't panic.
